text_block_list.text:
Starting today, we would finally begin 
full-scale training for Haru Urara's 
Twinkle Series challenge.

Haru Urara is also very eager to win 
the first place. I'm sure she will work 
hard enough.
—Or at least that's what I thought…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's the trainer! 
Starting today, I'm counting on you!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yes! 
I'm good at doing my best, 
so leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yay! 
I'll run a lot!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Eh-ho, eh-ho, eh-ho! 
Phew, the first round is over!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ye—

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ohhhhh!!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
A butterfly! 
It's a big one with a pretty pattern!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Look, look, over there! 
It's fluttering across the grass!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's going away! 
Wait, don't go!

Haru Urara ran at full speed. 
I thought about going after her, 
but maybe she has something in mind.

Trusting her, 
I decided to wait a little longer…

……… She hasn't come back at all! 
Maybe something happened… 
I must hurry to find her!
(She's not here…)
(Not here, either!)
(Same here!)
After searching around, finally―

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Pheeeew, I'm so tired! 
Let's take a break～!

I found Haru Urara! 
What's more, she's covered in mud… 
Did something happen after all?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Trainer! 
What a coincidence!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Did the trainer come here to chase after 
the fish, too?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hm?

―According to the story, Haru Urara,
after chasing the butterfly, reached the
riverbed and started chasing the fish.

I'm not quite sure about it… 
but maybe it was Haru Urara's way 
of training.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
You know, there was one that looked like 
the king of the river! 
I was so close to catching it～!

… I think she was just playing around 
after all.
choice_data_list: Come on, let's get back to training.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? 
Were we training?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm, I guess we were doing it, 
but I didn't feel like we were…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Aah! There was a big fish just now!
Isn't that the king?! Let's look
together!
choice_data_list: … You want to win first place, right?
… You want to win first place, right?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Of course! 
Because winning looks like a lot of fun!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I want to run a lot, win a lot, 
and have a lot of fun!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
That's why you became my trainer after
all!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I'm looking forward to working with you 
from now on! *Bow*

After all, Haru Urara has the will to 
do her best. As long as she can keep 
that up, her goal of getting first place 
will definitely come true, but…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's a carrot cloud! It looks
delicious～! Ah, wait, don't go～!

… It looks like I'll need to think about
how to get her to focus on her training
first.

In any case, my days of training 
with Haru Urara have begun!
